content:
Hi all, I have a simple question that I was not able to solve myself.
My current goal is
x * x + y * x + -(y * x) + y * -y = x ^ 2 - y ^ 2
So i tried to use rw [add_neg_cancel (y*x)]
but I got
tactic 'rewrite' failed, did not find instance of the pattern in the target expression y * x + -(y * x).
I know this looks stupid but i cannot wrap my head around it. I would appreciate any help. Thanks

I think I agree with lean here. There are invisible brackets in your code which aren't in the right place for you. Try hovering over the + in the goal where you think you can see the term you want rw to see, and probably it won't be highlighted (other things will be highlighted too)
Oh that's a really useful tip, that makes sense, thanks
Alvise Sembenico has marked this topic as resolved.
